availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Webster County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Sara Brooks. Father of David T. Brooks, Cattie Brooks, and Jennie Brooks. Farmer in Webster County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky,
Webster County, p. 154. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, District 4, p. 2-3. Find A Grave, "Yancy W. Brooks (1833-1898)," Memorial #52005340, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=52005340&ref=acom (accessed August 22, 2017).
